title: SoC COMM_ST 395-0-24 Topics in Communication Studies

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: There is a growing interest in using media (TV) and technology (video games) to inform children about health issues, such as counteracting obesity or improving hygiene, or using technology to help children manage a chronic illness (such as asthma). Sesame Street has a long history of working internationally to address children's health issues. This course will review studies and literature on how media have been and can be used to improve children's health around the world.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: No textbook. A course packet of readings will be used.
